text: "Start Me Up" is a 1981 song by English rock band The Rolling Stones. It is the leading song from their album Tattoo You. It topped the single charts in Australia and went to number 2 in the United States and Canada, number 5 in Switzerland, number 7 in the United Kingdom and Belgium, number 8 in Norway and number 11 in Ireland. It was used in a Windows 95 advertisement. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:The Rolling Stones songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Start Me Up
